c74object.name: sysexin
c74object.description: Receives MIDI system exclusive messages from a MIDI input device. It takes an optional argument for port selection. If a MIDI system exclusive message is received, sysexin outputs raw MIDI as integers.

inlet.digest: port Message Sets MIDI Input Port/Device

objarg.name: port
objarg.description: Specifies the port (a-z) from which to receive incoming MIDI system exclusive messages. If there is no argument, sysexin receives from port a (or the first input port listed in the MIDI Setup dialog.)

method.name: anything
method.description: Performs the same function as port but without need for the word, "port".

method.name: (mouse)
method.description: Double-clicking on a sysexin object shows a pop-up menu for choosing a MIDI port or device.

method.name: (MIDI)
method.description: The sysexin object receives its input from a MIDI sysex message received from a MIDI input device.

method.name: port
method.description: The word port, followed by a letter a-z or the name of a MIDI input port or device, sets the port from which the object receives incoming MIDI messages. The word port is optional and may be omitted.

entry.name: int
entry.description: MIDI system exclusive messages received from the specified port are sent out the outlet, byte-by-byte.
